form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF LAST ENTRY OF AN ALIEN

full_text: UNITED-STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved. Immigration and Naturalization Service Budget Bureau No. 43-R368.1 APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF LAST ENTRY OF AN ALIEN (See instructions on Reverse) (Fill in with typewriter or pript in blook letters in Ink) Take or mail to- For - No $ 30 FEE PAID IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE, Immigration and Naturalization Service Los Angeles, Calif. M &c F Date 6/20/13 Verified by Allen Registration No. A 10 534 184 I request that the American Consul at Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, Mexico be furnished a verification of my last lawful admission into the United States for permanent residence to be used in connection with the person(s) listed below: 1. My name is: (First) (Middle) (Last) VICENTE SANCHEZ DE LA HOYA 2. Present address: 1203 East 7th Street.. - Los Angeles 21, California 5. Date of birth 4. Place of birth 05-12-12 Durango, Mexico 5. I am a citizen or national of: (Country) Mexico 6. Father's name 7. Mother's maiden name Enrique De La Hoya Constanca Sanchez INFORMATION IN THESE BLOCKS PERTAIN TO MY LAST ARRIVAL INTO THE UNITED STATES 8. I was admitted under the name of: 9. Port of arrival VICENTE SANCHEZ DE LA HOYA El Paso, Texas 10. Date of arrival (Month) (Day) (Year) 11. Name of vessel or other means of conveyance 08-18-55 Bus 12. was 13. My occupation was: At that time I married Farmer was not 14. Last permanent residence before my last arrival was: MEXICO 15. Name and address of person in the United States to whom I was destined at the time of my last entry was: NONE 16. At time of last entry I was accompanied by: NONE 17. At the time of my last entry I traveled on an immigrant visa a permit to reenter a passport an allen registration receipt card and I have not been absent from the United States since, 18. I was was not in the United States before my last admission for permanent residence: (If so give dates of entry and departure) a. b. C. From From From March Or April 1952 August 1952 To To May 1952 October 1952 To Form 11550 E/ER (Rev. 5-25-61)
